message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Can you meet me at that price?
